answers.answer: I hope not I was induced with my first and don't want that done again. Ended with csection.
Luckily I still gave birth naturally but I was in labor for 15 hours and pushed for 2 hours. I'm sorry you had to have a c section. How far along are you now? I'm 20 weeks..
I was induced with my oldest daughter and went into labor with my youngest daughter on my own but ended in a c-section and this time with my son I'm just gonna gave a c-section

im also worried about being induced i was induced with my son 2 weeks late n due to that everything went wrong they tried to give me c-section when head was coming i refused n pushed so hard untill he popped out 20 mins later with help of forcepsi really hope things go smoother this time for you also all the best

I was induced with my daughter as I had gestational diabetes..And hoping I.don't have to this time.took three days to induce me..baby had an infection when born..I got ill so were in there another week. Hoping I get to go naturally xx
Wow. I'm sorry to hear of everything you ladies had to go through.. us ladies have to go through a lot to have our babies!!  It's all worth it when we get to hold them for the first time though! :)
I hope this time goes better for all of us!

question: Hi ladies! So, this is my second pregnancy. My first pregnancy I ended up having my son 10 days late via induction.. I actually even got induced a week before and it didn't put me into labor so I had to wait another whole week!! My question is has anyone ever had to be induced on their first pregnancy and then went naturally on their second.. I really hope this time I don't have to be induced..
title: 2nd pregnancy
